doc.title: 50 Shots.
doc.plot: On November 25, 2006 in Jamaica, Queens, Sean Bell, a 23 year old, unarmed African-American man, was shot and killed by NYPD on his wedding day. This documentary follows a protester who galvanizes a community at a rally that takes place one week after Sean's funeral.

On November 25, 2006 in Jamaica, Queens, Sean Bell, a 23 year old, unarmed African-American man, was shot and killed by NYPD on his wedding day. This documentary follows a protester who galvanizes a community at a rally that takes place one week after Sean's funeral.
